EmailTemplate.subject: Manage millions of connected devices with the Motive Connected Device Platform

${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Simplify your device management Cloud-based device management platform reduces OPEX — scales as your business grows The Nokia Motive Connected Device Platform is a cloud-based platform that offers lower startup costs, onboards devices faster and manages mass security updates — all while lowering your operating costs. The Nokia Motive Connected Device Platform scales with your business to manage millions of things — so important as IoT devices come on line in the next few years. It also simplifies device management complexity and acts as a launch pad for new services that get you to market more quickly.
